item.title: Virtualize Windows 11 with Proxmox
item.description: Introduction As Microsoft released Windows 11, it was made clear that TPM 2.0 and Secure boot is no longer optional but mandatory, without these capabilities on the hardware/virtual hardware, Windows 11 refuse to install. Step 1: Download Windows 11 ISO You can click Here for download ISO file. Step 2: Download virtio-win drivers disk You can click Here , download Latest virtio-win ISO. Step 3: Upload Windows 11 ISO and Latest virtio-win ISO to ProxMox login to ProxMox -> choose Node -> local (pve) -> ISO Images -> Upload
